cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.SY 

The paper discusses Markov random fields (MRFs) and their evaluation as generative models, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The paper also mentions RBMs, DBMs, and DBNs, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of MCMC transition operators suggests a focus on information theory (cs.IT) or control systems (cs.SY).
